Lua Form: 
400==tonumber((10576/95+95+72+37+97/29+29+99/95+95/24+24+25/89+89/59+59/98+98-48-21/43-8/33/40/14/31-98+98/81+81-14+14/54+54-70+70-40/8-97+97/16+16+76-72+72-47-31+31-58+58-48+48-57+57/86+86-3-20/45-34+34-87+87-51+51-93+93-97+97/40+40+24+73-33/61/35-36-13/63/40/39/96-76+76-75+75-94+94-88+88/69+69-72+72/60+60/47+47+16-31+31-29+29/32+32/16+16-16+16-68+68/97+97/90+90/86+86/43+43+14+94/27+27/25+25/27+27/67/92+92-94+94-78-59+59-59+59/80+80/14+14+30-35+35-28+28-58+58/74+74/93+93/91+91/41+41+77-81+81/57+57-19-38+38-72+72-5-21-42+42-64+64-91+91/65+65+45/20+20-67+67-85+85/34+34+68-78+78/19+19+88/1-11-10/5/37/97-54+54-83+83-32-20+20/67+67-82+82/17+17+14-45+45/19+19+66/61+61-91+91-99+99/95+95/20+20+13+83-54/74/76/82-72/22/41/75/64-68-39+39/67+67/40+40/25+25+26/7+7/47+47-18-95+95-62+62-69+69/93+93-85+85/85+85-53+53-1/10-84+84/43+43-42+42-91+91-20+20-53+53/7+7+30-2-69+69-19+19-19+19-63+63/82+82-96+96-81+81-66+66/9+9+53/37+37/69+69/36+36/43+43-18-4+4/69+69/93+93/40-47+47-21+21-54+54-27+27/2+2+3+50/85+85/19+19-46+46-5/88-29+29/93+93/53+53/91+91-87+87/80+80/44+44-20-71+71-7/94-60+60/18+18+21/86+86-94+94-52-52+52/36+36/72+72/66+66/91+91/95+95-46/39-54/53-50/19-82+82-93+93/79+79-63+63-61+61/18+18-14+14-98+98/68+68+13+53-91+91-2/93-82+82-27/82/51-55+55-36/13/29-49+49-52+52/52+52-82+82-83+83/1-1/73/2/47/64-77+77/59+59-58+58-71+71/92+92/73+73-25/58-8/24/20/89/56/7/32-59+59-24/4/98-24/68-63+63/59+59/93+93/52+52-12-99+99/43+43+42/8+8+59/61+61/71+71-35/12/82-83+83/44+44/24+24+93-28-36-38+38/32+32-48+48/39+39-69+69-19+19/87+87/24+24/47+47/80+80-72/82-48/70/96-89+89/72+72/92+92/25+25-51+51/61+61/31+31+46/62+62-28/68/9/6/71-27-30/66/61/42-24/58-70+70/93+93-31/40/61-78+78-14/58-39/24/62/90-19/42-64+64/92+92-7/70-47-94+94/25+25+81-93+93/78+78/7+7+82-57/33/97-51/1/74/86/56-19-42+42/68+68/82-0.7099042149171737).."")
=====================
Base Form:
10576/95+95+72+37+97/29+29+99/95+95/24+24+25/89+89/59+59/98+98-48-21/43-8/33/40/14/31-98+98/81+81-14+14/54+54-70+70-40/8-97+97/16+16+76-72+72-47-31+31-58+58-48+48-57+57/86+86-3-20/45-34+34-87+87-51+51-93+93-97+97/40+40+24+73-33/61/35-36-13/63/40/39/96-76+76-75+75-94+94-88+88/69+69-72+72/60+60/47+47+16-31+31-29+29/32+32/16+16-16+16-68+68/97+97/90+90/86+86/43+43+14+94/27+27/25+25/27+27/67/92+92-94+94-78-59+59-59+59/80+80/14+14+30-35+35-28+28-58+58/74+74/93+93/91+91/41+41+77-81+81/57+57-19-38+38-72+72-5-21-42+42-64+64-91+91/65+65+45/20+20-67+67-85+85/34+34+68-78+78/19+19+88/1-11-10/5/37/97-54+54-83+83-32-20+20/67+67-82+82/17+17+14-45+45/19+19+66/61+61-91+91-99+99/95+95/20+20+13+83-54/74/76/82-72/22/41/75/64-68-39+39/67+67/40+40/25+25+26/7+7/47+47-18-95+95-62+62-69+69/93+93-85+85/85+85-53+53-1/10-84+84/43+43-42+42-91+91-20+20-53+53/7+7+30-2-69+69-19+19-19+19-63+63/82+82-96+96-81+81-66+66/9+9+53/37+37/69+69/36+36/43+43-18-4+4/69+69/93+93/40-47+47-21+21-54+54-27+27/2+2+3+50/85+85/19+19-46+46-5/88-29+29/93+93/53+53/91+91-87+87/80+80/44+44-20-71+71-7/94-60+60/18+18+21/86+86-94+94-52-52+52/36+36/72+72/66+66/91+91/95+95-46/39-54/53-50/19-82+82-93+93/79+79-63+63-61+61/18+18-14+14-98+98/68+68+13+53-91+91-2/93-82+82-27/82/51-55+55-36/13/29-49+49-52+52/52+52-82+82-83+83/1-1/73/2/47/64-77+77/59+59-58+58-71+71/92+92/73+73-25/58-8/24/20/89/56/7/32-59+59-24/4/98-24/68-63+63/59+59/93+93/52+52-12-99+99/43+43+42/8+8+59/61+61/71+71-35/12/82-83+83/44+44/24+24+93-28-36-38+38/32+32-48+48/39+39-69+69-19+19/87+87/24+24/47+47/80+80-72/82-48/70/96-89+89/72+72/92+92/25+25-51+51/61+61/31+31+46/62+62-28/68/9/6/71-27-30/66/61/42-24/58-70+70/93+93-31/40/61-78+78-14/58-39/24/62/90-19/42-64+64/92+92-7/70-47-94+94/25+25+81-93+93/78+78/7+7+82-57/33/97-51/1/74/86/56-19-42+42/68+68/82-0.7099042149171737
